Name: Wildernis
Review Text: I went here with some pots to fill and looking to expand my plant range. The staff were incredibly helpful, giving me so much time to help find the right size plants and tell me how much water and care they need. I am very happy with my ‚Ä¶

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Worthless overpriced plants.... After hearing and reading good reviews, I thought it would worth buying a nice plant from here. The prices are astronomical compared to the quality they deliver. Never ever gonna buy from here again.

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Wildernis is a small store for the true plantlover. The amount of plants and potts is incredible. The atmosphere is very cozy, and if you want they even serve hot drinks. ‚Ä¶

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Excellent quality of bulbs and flowers plants in general. The atmosphere its lovely and professional. Definitely recommend you this shop. Now I have my personal dutch garden, in mallorca. Thank you.

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Amazing shop to buy plants, beautiful vases, plant stands, and gardening books/tools. Great for inspiration too! It's a small shop offering local brands, so keep that in mind: the price tag is higher than the average gardening megacenters. They also offer coffee/tea and small bites, besides hosting workshops.

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Amazing little shop full of cute plants and gardening accessories from floor to ceiling. The staff is passionate and helpful. I wish they had more choices in tiny plants, there are always sold out at the end of the day!

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Loved the place! Great selection of plants for such a small shop. Cute arrangement and lovely staff. The prices were also really good.

Name: Wildernis

Name: Wildernis

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Beautified oasis in the Oud-West buurt (neighborhood) in Amsterdam. Not far from the Anne Frank house or Vondelpark, this is more for the "locals" since you won't be carrying indoor plants home on the plane! ‚Ä¶

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: I can't believe all these positive reviews! Surely the owners must have asked all their friends to write one. This shop is shockingly overrated. Yes, it is very Instagrammable indeed, but that's about it. The staff is unhelpful and ‚Ä¶

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: This shop is every plant enthusiasts dream! Great collection of plants, pots, books and other related products. The staff is very friendly and helpful when you ask for help and that's exactly the approach that I like.

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Lovely selection of plants and pots, and the staff are very knowledgeable about the care each plant needs. Keep in mind that the shop receives its plant deliveries on Mondays so for the biggest selection pop round early in the week.

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: A very cute shop for indoor plants.

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: I bought here pot ground for my plants ‚ÄúBiologische tuindaarde compost‚Äù which has caused a massive small black flies infestation in my apartment (gnats). I have them in the thousands and the only solution is to buy online ground nematodes ‚Ä¶

Name: Wildernis

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Urban garden and plant shop in Amsterdam. Great place for plant lovers because we all know plants make people happy. It's nice and cosy so grab a coffee and cake whilst there.

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Awesome selection of plants, pots and some gardening accessories. It's one of those stores that when you enter, you want to acquire everything. Friendly staff and eager to help.

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: A plant lover's paradise. A fun mix between plants that are very on trend, and some things you won't find so easily elsewhere. Staff are very knowledgeable.

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Great plants and pots, staff is super kind and helpful. Highly recommended!

Name: Wildernis

Name: Wildernis

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Little oasis of green on the busy  Bilderdijkstraat. They were super knowledgeable and helpful with terranium related questions. They also do workshops and you can sit down and have a drink!

Name: Wildernis
Review Text: Beatiful little shop with a wide variety of plants and really nice people. You might leave a little bit sad, that you can't replicate the jungle in the shop at home.

Name: Wildernis

Name: Wildernis
